item.title: Teodora add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "With enough courage, you can do without a reputation." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "My dear, I don't give a damn." -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Margaret Mitchell
item.description: "I will think about that tomorrow!" -- Margaret Mitchell

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Goodbye," said the fox. "And now here is my secret, a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "What makes the desert beautiful,' said the little prince, 'is that somewhere it hides a well..." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "The proof that the little prince existed is that he was charming, that he laughed, and that he was looking for a sheep. If anybody wants a sheep, that is a proof that he exists." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Teodora add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "You see, one loves the sunset when one is so sad." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "We'll be Friends Forever, won't we, Pooh?' asked Piglet. Even longer,' Pooh answered." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Some people care too much. I think it's called love." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Don't underestimate the value of Doing Nothing, of just going along, listening to all the things you can't hear, and not bothering." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Just because an animal is large, it doesn't mean he doesn't want kindness; however big Tigger seems to be, remember that he wants as much kindness as Roo." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Some people talk to animals. Not many listen though. That's the problem." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If the person you are talking to doesn't appear to be listening, be patient. It may simply be that he has a small piece of fluff in his ear." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Teodora add a quote by A.A. Milne
Teodora add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Teodora add a quote by Carmen Rodrigues
item.description: "Friendships are the most important thing you can have in your life. Sometimes they have their ups and downs. Sometimes it's your fault and sometimes it's not. But the key to handling those ups and downs is to remember that good friends will always find their way back to each other." -- Carmen Rodrigues
